channel.title: vmware on Jonathan`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in vmware on Jonathan`s Blog

item.title: BLWL[28] Manjaro无法启动vmware虚拟机问题
item.description: 问题1 Could not open /dev/vmmon: ???. Please make sure that the kernel module `vmmon’ is loaded. 解决方案 1.查看自己的内核版本 > uname -r 5.6.7-1-MANJARO 2.安装对应的 linux-headers sudo pacman -S linux56-headers 3.加载内核模块 sudo modprobe -a vmw_vmci vmmon 问题
